title: Repository Gate: Confirmation Gate
body: PRIORITY 0 REPO RULE: Confirmation Gate - RISKY/UNKNOWN classifications must be confirmed. Logic: !((classification in ['RISKY','UNKNOWN']) && (confirmedFlag == false)). If classification is RISKY or UNKNOWN and confirmedFlag is false, reject the operation. Failure action: REJECT with message 'Confirmation required.' This gate must be evaluated before executing any classified commands.
